Name: The Montford
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A wonderfully wet Martini with the addition of Lillet and orange bitters.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Dan Warner at the Beefeater Distillery in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Montford contains 184 calories
